meanings.sent1: The judoists at the dojo were learning new techniques.
meanings.sent2: Many judoists compete in tournaments to showcase their skills.
meanings.sent3: The judoists decided to have a friendly match to unwind after training.
meanings.sent4: In the world of martial arts, judoists are like graceful dancers on the mat.
meanings.sent5: The judoists' dedication to their sport is truly inspiring.

meanings.sent1: We watched as the judoists practiced their moves in unison.
meanings.sent2: The judoists' uniforms were all neatly folded in the locker room.
meanings.sent3: The judoists gathered for a group photo after their class.
meanings.sent4: The judoists' camaraderie was evident in their interactions.
meanings.sent5: The judoists' passion for the sport was contagious to everyone around them.
